item.description:
Hot air balloon rides, model planes taking off and landing on the pond, large food court with German, Italian & American foods all at reasonable prices! Over 60 artists, vendors, craft booths, and live bands. Event is called: OKTOBERFEST at the Little Red Shop, 12 Hopedale Street, Hopedale, MA.
Note: Rain Date is 10/9/2010. This event runs all day, hours are 10 am - 7 pm - go with your friends at your leisure or make arrangements with other yes replies to meet there. (This venue is not a scheduled Meetup event, I will not be attending, just wanted to let you know of another FREE event)
item.name: FREE Admission FREE Parking FREE Shuttle Service
